subject: Re: [junit] NoSuchMethodError running from Ant
msgSnippet: I suspect that Ant has a different version of JUnit in its internal classpath ahead of the one you expect it to use. Check Ant s classpath. ... J. B.

th ahead of the one you expect it to use. Check Ant's classpath.
